title: Bad Liar
author: Selena Gomez
lyrics:
[00:04.13] I was walking down the street the other day
[00:10.58] Tryna distract myself
[00:12.45] But then I see your face
[00:14.34] Oh, wait, that's someone else
[00:16.40] Tryna play it coy
[00:18.40] Tryna make it disappear
[00:20.22] But just like the battle of Troy
[00:22.28] There's nothing subtle here, ah-ah
[00:24.35] In my room there's a king size space
[00:26.42] Bigger than it used to be
[00:28.21] If you want, you can rent that place
[00:30.42] Call me an amenity, ah-ah
[00:34.29] Even if it's in my dreams, ah
[00:40.18] Ooh, ooh-ooh
[00:42.65] You're taking up a fraction of my mind
[00:47.64] Oh-ooh, ooh-ooh
[00:50.71] Every time I watch you serpentine
[00:55.15] Oh, I'm tryin', I'm tryin', I'm tryin'
